description: The image contains a fan, a table, and some fruits. The fan is located on the right side of the table, and the fruits are placed on the table.

objects.name: fan
objects.location: on the right side of the table
objects.relationship: The fan is placed on the right side of the table, providing air circulation.

objects.location: in the center of the image
objects.relationship: The table is located in the center of the image, providing a surface for placing the fan and fruits.
